Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Re ( 300 mg / kg ) inhibited OIH in both the thermal sensitivity test and the acetic acid - induced writhing test .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Re |
| OIH |

In this paragraph, "Re" is the abbreviation for the chemical compound or substance that is inhibiting OIH (Osmotic Ileitis Hypersensitivity). The exact identity of Re is not provided in the paragraph, so it remains an unknown chemical entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Re (300 mg / kg) |

In the revised paragraph, only "Re" is identified as a chemical entity since it is explicitly stated as being inhibited in the tests and its quantity is provided. The other entities, "OIH," "thermal sensitivity test," and "acetic acid - induced writhing test," do not clearly refer to chemicals, but rather to conditions or tests used to evaluate the effect of the chemical "Re."
